accept.name: Accepted
accept.tooltip: Accepted by the storage provider. Pending on-chain publication.

accepted.name: Accepted
accepted.tooltip: Accepted by the storage provider. Pending on-chain publication.

published.name: Published
published.tooltip: The deal has been published on-chain. Sealing is in progress.

active.name: Active
active.tooltip: The deal is currently active on-chain.

maintenance.name: Maintenance
maintenance.tooltip: The storage provider is undergoing maintenance and not accepting deals.

noSpaceLeft.name: No space left
noSpaceLeft.tooltip: No storage space available for new deals.

sizeRateLimit.name: Size Rate limit
sizeRateLimit.tooltip: Deal rejected: the total size of deals set in CIDgravity has already been reached.

rateLimit.name: Rate limit
rateLimit.tooltip: Deal rejected: the maximum number of deals in CIDgravity has already been reached.

storageAcceptanceLogic.name: Acceptance logic
storageAcceptanceLogic.tooltip: Deal rejected: storage acceptance logic not passed.

invalidProposal.name: Invalid proposal
invalidProposal.tooltip: Deal rejected: proposal format does not match requirements.

clientBlocked.name: Client blocked
clientBlocked.tooltip: Rejected due to the client being blocked

startEpochBelowSealingBuffer.name: Start epoch
startEpochBelowSealingBuffer.tooltip: Reject due to start date below defined sealing buffer

neverPublished.name: Never published
neverPublished.tooltip: Deal accepted but never published on time.

publishedExpired.name: Published expired
publishedExpired.tooltip: Deal not sealed before the client's start epoch.

clientNotEnoughtDatacap.name: Datacap
clientNotEnoughtDatacap.tooltip: Not enough remaining datacap to send this deal

priceTooLow.name: Price too low
priceTooLow.tooltip: Price is below Storage Provider price

curioBackPressure.name: Back pressure
curioBackPressure.tooltip: The deal has been rejected by the built-in curio back pressure.

unsupportedTransferProtocol.name: Unsupported transfer protocol
unsupportedTransferProtocol.dropdownName: Proposal Rejected - Transfer protocol not supported
unsupportedTransferProtocol.tooltip: Curio does not support libp2p transfer protocol
